```{r workshops, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
linkmd <-function(x, y=x, after = "\n\n") paste0("[", x, "]", "(", y, ")", after)
ls_wks <- yaml::yaml.load_file("workshops.yaml")
for (i in seq_along(ls_wks)) {
  if (!is.null(ls_wks[[i]]$name)) {
    cat("### ", ls_wks[[i]]$name, "\n\n")
    if (!is.null(ls_wks[[i]]$link_en)) cat("#### ", linkmd("English", ls_wks[[i]]$link_en))
    if (!is.null(ls_wks[[i]]$link_fr)) cat("#### ", linkmd("French", ls_wks[[i]]$link_fr))
  }
}
```
